title: Community Understanding Project through Location-Based Situated Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device operation skills and general understanding of community engagement activities
context.additional_context: Learners conduct field investigations using mobile devices, monitor learning outcomes through data analysis tools, and maximize educational effectiveness by integrating location-based learning design (LD) and multi-stakeholder analysis

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three or more local cultural heritage sites using location-based tools.
Learners can visualize field survey data and write reports analyzing social issues in the community.
Learners can evaluate their learning processes and suggest improvement plans using digital analysis tools.

resources: Community resource network (museums, historical sites, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
